default.title: Cent Programming Language
default.tagline: The systems programming language you learn fast and run faster.

simple.title: Simple
simple.content: No one likes wasting time debugging language quirks. Cent was designed to stay out of your way.

explicit.title: Explicit
explicit.content: It should always be clear what your program will do. Cent is designed to never be ambiguous.

fast.title: Fast
fast.content: In Cent, the most obvious way to write code is also the fastest.

modern.title: Modern
modern.content: Cent includes modern programming features with virtually zero impact on performance.
